    • variant

      OpeningExplorerApi.HistoryBuilder variant(Enums.VariantName variant)
      Variant

    • variant

      default OpeningExplorerApi.HistoryBuilder variant(Function<Enums.VariantName.Provider, Enums.VariantName> variant)
      Variant

    • fen

      OpeningExplorerApi.HistoryBuilder fen(String fen)
      Parameters:
      fen - FEN of the root position Example: "rnbqkbnr/ppp1pppp/8/3pP3/8/8/PPPP1PPP/RNBQKBNR b KQkq - 0 2"

    • play

      OpeningExplorerApi.HistoryBuilder play(String play)
      Comma separated sequence of legal moves in UCI notation. Play additional moves starting from fen.
      Required to find an opening name, if fen is not an exact match for a named position.
      Example: "e2e4,e7e5,c2c4,c7c6,c4e5"

    • speeds

      OpeningExplorerApi.HistoryBuilder speeds(Set<Enums.Speed> speeds)
      One or more game speeds to look for

    • speeds

      default OpeningExplorerApi.HistoryBuilder speeds(Enums.Speed... speeds)
      One or more game speeds to look for

    • ratings

      OpeningExplorerApi.LichessBuilder ratings(Set<Enums.RatingGroup> ratings)
      One or more rating groups, ranging from their value to the next higher group

    • ratings

      default OpeningExplorerApi.LichessBuilder ratings(Enums.RatingGroup... ratings)

    • since

      OpeningExplorerApi.HistoryBuilder since(String since)
      Include only games from this month or later
      Default "2017-04"

    • until

      OpeningExplorerApi.HistoryBuilder until(String until)
      Include only games from this month or earlier
      Default "3000-12"
